title: Restore PlayPal logo to gradient wordmark with underline

requirements.text: Replace the current PlayPal logo assets with the previous-format PlayPal wordmark: the text “PlayPal” filled with a blue-to-yellow gradient and a single horizontal line underneath, keeping the app name as “PlayPal”. The updated logo must be used everywhere the app currently references the PlayPal logo assets under /assets/generated/ (PWA icons, Apple touch icon, and the Login screen logo image).

quotes: Déjale nombre PlayPal pero el logo devolve el formato de antes, PlayPal color azul y amarillo en degradado con una línea debajo

acceptanceCriteria: The following static assets exist at frontend/public/assets/generated and visually match the requested style (gradient PlayPal text with an underline): playpal-logo.dim_512x512.png, playpal-logo.dim_192x192.png, playpal-logo.dim_180x180.png.

The Login screen (frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx) renders the updated logo image at /assets/generated/playpal-logo.dim_512x512.png and the logo is visibly the gradient wordmark with an underline.
PWA metadata continues to reference the same logo asset paths (frontend/index.html apple-touch-icon and frontend/public/manifest.json icons), and the referenced files render the updated logo.
The production service worker precache list (frontend/public/service-worker.js) continues to include the same PlayPal logo filenames, and those cached files are the updated logo.

constraints: Do not change the application name; it must remain “PlayPal”.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Fixing or investigating the prior deployment failure (not requested).
Changing any other UI copy, language, or app theme beyond what is necessary to restore the requested logo format.

required: “PlayPal” wordmark with a smooth blue-to-yellow gradient fill and a single thin horizontal underline below the text, centered on a transparent background (playpal-logo.dim_512x512.png, 512x512)
“PlayPal” wordmark with a smooth blue-to-yellow gradient fill and a single thin horizontal underline below the text, centered on a transparent background (playpal-logo.dim_192x192.png, 192x192)
“PlayPal” wordmark with a smooth blue-to-yellow gradient fill and a single thin horizontal underline below the text, centered on a transparent background (playpal-logo.dim_180x180.png, 180x180)
